title: 1.146 STATE FISH.
text:
The walleye, Stizostedion v. vitreum, is the official fish of the state of Minnesota.
A photograph of the walleye shall be preserved in the Office of the Secretary of State.

variables.name: official_fish.state
variables.description: The state for which the fish is the official fish.

variables.name: official_fish.name
variables.description: The common name of the official fish.

variables.name: official_fish.scientific_name
variables.description: The scientific name of the official fish.

consequences: The walleye is confirmed as the official fish of Minnesota.
